ProcessInstanceNode.name: ProcessInstanceNode
ProcessInstanceNode.description: Represents a step in an instance of an approval process. Compare to ProcessNode, which describes the step in a process definition. Use this object to retrieve approval history.

CompletedDate.description: The completion date and time of this step in the approval process. The ElapsedTimeDay, ElapsedTimeHours, and ElapsedTimeMinutes field values are calculated using CompletedDate.

ElapsedTimeInDays.description: The total time in days since this step was started.

ElapsedTimeInHours.description: The total time in hours since this step was started.

ElapsedTimeInMinutes.description: The total time in minutes since this step was started.

LastActorId.description: The last actor that approved or rejected this step.

NodeStatus.description: The status of this approval instance, for example Started, Pending, or Approved.

ProcessInstanceId.description: The approval process this step is part of.

ProcessNodeName.description: The name of this step.The contents of this field can be publicly viewed.
